name: workers-for-platforms-template
description: A template for building website hosting platforms using Cloudflare Workers for Platforms. Deploy static sites and custom Workers code through a simple web interface.

CLOUDFLARE_API_KEY.description: Your Global API Key (for managing user sites). Find at dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens → Global API Key → View

CUSTOM_DOMAIN.description: (Optional) Your root domain (e.g., platform.com). Leave empty to use workers.dev
